name: review-ai-reply-functions
description: Firebase Cloud Functions for automated AI review workflow

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf src/shared && mkdir -p src/shared && cp -r ../lib/ai ../lib/google ../lib/types src/shared/ && find src/shared/ai -name '*.ts' -exec sed -i.bak -e 's|@/lib/types|../../types|g' -e 's|@/lib/ai/prompts/template|../ai/prompts/template|g' {} \; && find src/shared/google -name '*.ts' -exec sed -i.bak 's|@/lib/types|../types|g' {} \; && find src/shared/types -name '*.ts' -exec sed -i.bak -e 's|@/lib/ai/prompts/template|../ai/prompts/template|g' -e 's|firebase/firestore|firebase-admin/firestore|g' {} \; && find src/shared -name '*.bak' -delete
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
